attributes.action: EU Referendum - reject the result as the public are not well informed to decide.
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farages campaign on Brexit suggested if we were to leave the EU, the NHS would receive an extra £350million a week. Once the referendum results were out, Nigel Farage said this comment was a mistake. Some of the public would have swayed to vote out on this fact alone...only to be told it was a lie.
attributes.background: EU REFERENDUM - The public have been misled by both sides and are not well informed in any case to make such a big decision that will have serious consequences on the UK's future. I suggest the EU Referendum result should be voided and a decision should be made by well informed MPs.

rejection.details:
These petitions are very similar to the one which you submitted:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
